name: Jumpy Haha
description:
Jumpy Haha is a result of my 2021 new years resolution to learn Unreal Engine.

It is a 3D platformer that is made to be completed as fast as possible. The main mechanic is jumping and boosting into walls. Bouncing off a wall gives you some speed and another boost. You can also repeatedly jump and boost into the ground to gain extra speed.

There are a ton of short cuts in the levels that are possible

Thanks to Zach Paquette for modeling the character!!
